Html:
I see how I can create an area chart using the AreaSeries, but is there a way to create a stacked area chart so the series are stacked vertically?  Here is an example of what I am talking about:

http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms159211.aspx
Anyone know how to do this, or if it is even possible?

myczek,

Stacked series aren't currently supported - though they're planned for a future release. That said, some people have had a go at adding such support themselves - please have a look at the following if you're the adventursome sort:

http://www.sharpcoder.co.uk/post/2009/05/03/A-Stacked-Bar-Chart-Silverlight-control.aspx

Hope this helps!

Thanks for the link, I'll give it a try, and I look forward to the future built in support for stacked series.

John Myczek

I second myczek's request - stacked charts are a common requirement for business apps (stacked columns and areas), and this would really be a welcome addition!

Looking forward a future release including that feature,

Mathias
